# Litestar Vite

> **Version**: 0.16.0 | Python 3.10+ | Node 20.19+ or 22.12+ | Vite 6.x/7.x

Seamless integration between Litestar and Vite with Inertia.js support.

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install litestar-vite
litestar assets install  # Install frontend deps
litestar run             # Start backend + Vite dev server
```

## Key Concepts

- **Hybrid Architecture**: Python backend (Litestar) + TypeScript frontend (Vite).
- **Modes**:
  - `spa`: Single Page App (default).
  - `hybrid`/`inertia`: Inertia.js (v2 protocol) with precognition support.
  - `template`/`htmx`: Server-side templates (Jinja2) + Vite assets.
  - `framework`/`ssr`/`ssg`: Meta-frameworks (Astro, Nuxt, SvelteKit) via proxy.
- **Configuration**: `vite.config.ts` > `.litestar.json` (auto-generated) > Defaults.
- **CLI**: Always use `litestar assets [serve|build|install|status|doctor]` to manage the frontend (or `litestar run` to start both).

## Documentation

See `llms-full.txt` for comprehensive guides, API reference, and architectural details.

## Project Structure

- `src/py/litestar_vite/`: Python backend (VitePlugin, ViteConfig, ViteAssetLoader, InertiaPlugin).
- `src/js/src/`: TypeScript frontend (Vite plugin, CSRF helpers, HTMX utilities, Inertia helpers).
- `examples/`: 13 working examples (React, Vue, Svelte, Angular, Astro, Nuxt, SvelteKit, HTMX).
